org.mini2Dx.core.collisions

Class ConcurrentPointQuadTree<T extends Positionable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Shape
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Rectangle
        • org.mini2Dx.core.collisions.ConcurrentPointQuadTree<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuadTree<T>, PositionChangeListener<T>, Parallelogram
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConcurrentRegionQuadTree

    public class ConcurrentPointQuadTree<T extends Positionable>
extends Rectangle
implements QuadTree<T>
    Implements a thread-safe point quadtree
    See Also:
    Wikipedia: Point Quad Tree

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConcurrentPointQuadTree

        public ConcurrentPointQuadTree(int elementLimitPerQuad,
                       int mergeWatermark,
                       float x,
                       float y,
                       float width,
                       float height)
        Constructs a ConcurrentPointQuadTree with a specified element limit and watermark
        Parameters:
        elementLimitPerQuad - The maximum number of elements in a quad before it is split into 4 child ConcurrentPointQuadTrees
        mergeWatermark - When a parent ConcurrentPointQuadTree's total elements go lower than this mark, the child ConcurrentPointQuadTrees will be merged back together
        x - The x coordinate of the ConcurrentPointQuadTree
        y - The y coordiante of the ConcurrentPointQuadTree
        width - The width of the ConcurrentPointQuadTree
        height - The height of the ConcurrentPointQuadTree

      • ConcurrentPointQuadTree

        public ConcurrentPointQuadTree(int elementLimitPerQuad,
                       float x,
                       float y,
                       float width,
                       float height)
        Constructs a ConcurrentPointQuadTree with a specified element limit and no merging watermark. As elements are removed, small sized child ConcurrentPointQuadTrees will not be merged back together.
        Parameters:
        elementLimitPerQuad - The maximum number of elements in a quad before it is split into 4 child ConcurrentPointQuadTrees
        x - The x coordinate of the ConcurrentPointQuadTree
        y - The y coordiante of the ConcurrentPointQuadTree
        width - The width of the ConcurrentPointQuadTree
        height - The height of the ConcurrentPointQuadTree

      • ConcurrentPointQuadTree

        public ConcurrentPointQuadTree(ConcurrentPointQuadTree<T> parent,
                       float x,
                       float y,
                       float width,
                       float height)
        Constructs a ConcurrentPointQuadTree as a child of another ConcurrentPointQuadTree
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent ConcurrentPointQuadTree
        x - The x coordinate of the ConcurrentPointQuadTree
        y - The y coordiante of the ConcurrentPointQuadTree
        width - The width of the ConcurrentPointQuadTree
        height - The height of the ConcurrentPointQuadTree
